briefTitle: Cancer Experience Registry (CER) for Cancer Patients and Caregivers
officialTitle: Cancer Experience Registry: An Online Survey Research Study to Understand the Experiences of Cancer Patients and Caregivers
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* Have received a cancer diagnosis or have been a family caregiver or informal caregiver (i.e., a relative or friend) for someone diagnosed with cancer
* Live in United States, a US territory, or Canada
* Able to read and understand English

Exclusion criteria:

* None
